shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=ax = above(x,0.5);
per_pixel_7=bx = below(x,0.5);
per_pixel_8=ay = above(y,0.5);
per_pixel_9=by = below(y,0.5);
per_pixel_10=zoom = zoom + abs(2*dx_r)+dy_r;
per_pixel_11=
per_pixel_12=zoom = zoom + abs(6*dx_r*(2*sin(4*rad-cos(1-sin(4*ang)))));
per_pixel_13=zoom = zoom + 0.1*(1.14*rad)*below(rad,2.3);
per_pixel_14=dx = dx + 8*dx_r*(2*sin(2.2*rad))*ax*ay;
per_pixel_15=dy = dy + 8*dy_r*(2*sin(-2.2*rad))*ax*ay;
per_pixel_16=sx = sx + 7*dx_r*(1.2*cos(14*ang))*ax*by;
per_pixel_17=sy = sy + 7*dy_r*(1.2*cos(14*ang))*ax*by;
per_pixel_18=dx = dx + 4*dx_r*(sin(5*rad))*bx*ay;
per_pixel_19=dy = dy + 4*dy_r*(sin(5*rad))*bx*ay;
per_pixel_20=sx = sx + 8*dx_r*(1.6*sin(0.25-rad))*bx*by;
per_pixel_21=sy = sy + 8*dy_r*(1.6*sin(0.25-rad))*bx*by;
per_pixel_22=zoom = zoom - 0.05*((2.2+rad)*abs(cos(3*ang)));
per_pixel_23=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_24=
per_pixel_25=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_26=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_27=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_28=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));
per_pixel_29=rot = rot + 0.01*(0.5*cos(ang*5*bass*time));
per_pixel_30=
per_pixel_31=dx = dx + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dx_r;
per_pixel_32=dy = dy + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dy_r;
per_pixel_33=rot=0.1*pow(-ang,3)-1.18*sin(ang);
per_pixel_34=zoom=1.45*sin(-rad)+1.3+ sin(rad);
per_pixel_35=dx = dx + 0.09*sin(q8*0.785);
per_pixel_36=dy = dy + 0.09*sin(q8*0.675);
per_pixel_37=//zoom = zoom +q7;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`    // sample previous frame
warp_4=`    ret = tex2D( sampler_fc_main, uv ).xyz*.8;
warp_5=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_6=`                      ((uv.xyy
warp_7=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_8=`                      ).xyz*
warp_9=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_10=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
warp_11=`                     );
warp_12=`if(ret.x+ret.y+ret.z>.5)ret += (noise2)*.5; 
warp_13=`
warp_14=`    ret += GetBlur1(uv)*.2;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`    // darken (decay) over time and distance from center
warp_17=`    ret *= ret/(1.4*rad); //or try: ret -= 0.004;
warp_18=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`    
comp_4=`    //rotate texture cords
comp_5=`    float texRotU2 = (uv[0] - 0.5)*cos(-q8*0.29) + (uv[1] - 0.5)*sin(-q8*0.29);
comp_6=`    float texRotv2 = -(uv[0] - 0.5)*sin(-q8*0.29) + (uv[1] - 0.5)*cos(-q8*0.29);
comp_7=`
comp_8=`	
comp_9=`	    float2 uv2 = float2(texRotU2*0.8 +0.5, texRotv2*0.8 + 0.5);
comp_10=`
comp_11=`    float2 uv_echo = (uv - 0.5)*1.000*float2(-1,-1) + 0.5;
comp_12=`    ret = lerp( tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz, 
comp_13=`                tex2D(sampler_main, uv_echo).xyz, 
comp_14=`                0.50 
comp_15=`              )*0.8;
comp_16=`    
comp_17=`float4 noise2 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
comp_18=`                      ((uv.xyy
comp_19=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
comp_20=`                      ).xyz*
comp_21=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
comp_22=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*0.4 
comp_23=`                     );
comp_24=`if(ret.x+ret.y+ret.z<.1)ret += (noise2)*.3; 
comp_25=`
comp_26=`    ret += tex2D(sampler_main, uv2*q9).xyz*0.2;
comp_27=`    ret *= 1.00; //gamma
comp_28=`    ret = 1 - ret*(1 - ret)*4; //invert
comp_29=`}
